divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking pictures on and off through the night of the 5 of may. I take pictures and star watch often. While taking pictures of the moon after 1 am i caught a light in my pics that i knew immediately to be something strange. I just held still in excitement and awe and just kept clicking. As quick as i seen it it disappeared on me. The whole thing lasted seconds. I dont think it went away. I think the light it was emitting (red) just stopped. I would be interested to see if maybe it is in the rest of my pics. I havent altered them in any way. I dont want to play with contrast or anything on them till they are properly examined.
Summary: light around moon then changed direction flew then disappeared
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Tallmadge
There were 2 other sightings in Tallmadge on or around May 6th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
